applications.name: Gaps
applications.description: Searches through your Plex Server for all movies, then queries for known movies in the same collection.

applications.name: Jackett2Telegram
applications.description: A self-hosted Telegram Python Bot that dumps posts from Jackett RSS feeds to a Telegram chat.

applications.name: Mayhem's Star Scripts
applications.description: Scripts to make using the starr apps easier, actively being updated

applications.name: Radarr AutoDelete
applications.description: Simple script, which deletes movies with a specific tag after a certain amount of days

applications.name: Radarr-Striptracks
applications.description: adds a script to automatically strip out unwanted audio and subtitle streams, keeping only the desired languages.

applications.name: Sickbeard MP4 Automator
applications.description: Automatically converts media files downloaded by various programs to a standardized format, and tags them with the appropriate metadata from TMDB if the container supports tagging.

applications.name: TrailerDownloader
applications.description: Downloads all missing trailers for movies in your Plex library.
